column1: jo-ann ellen scott| jo-ann ellen scott. born: december 01
column7: beloved daughter of mary doris huber and the late edward john; dear sister of mark huber
column8: christine falbo and her husband anthony
column9: jeannette huber and her husband walt; cherished aunt of five; treasured great aunt of two. family and friends will celebrate jo-anns life at the family owned evans funeral chapel and cremation services parkville
column10: 8800 harford rd. on thursday from 9-11 am at which time a memorial service will begin. interment lorraine park cemetery. memorial contributions in jo-anns name may be made to defenders of animal rights
